00026 #define LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER1_LOCAL lsm2ddeltafunctionorder1local_
00027 #define LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER2_LOCAL lsm2ddeltafunctionorder2local_
00028 
00029 
00030 /*
00031 *  LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER1_LOCAL() computes first order accurate delta
00032 *  function discretization of a zero level set for a given LS function
00033 *  following P. Smereka, "The numerical approximation of a delta function 
00034 *  with application to level set methods", JCP, 2006.
00035 *  The function is supported at a minimal set of gridpoints near the zero
00036 *  level set.
00037 *
00038 *  Arguments:
00039 *    phi(in):           level set function
00040 *    delta(out):        discretized delta function corresp. to zero level
00041 *    norm_phi_* (in):   components of grad(phi)/|grad(phi)|, 
00042 *                       obtained by 2nd order central diff
00043 *    *_gb (in):        index range for ghostbox
00044 *    dx,dy(in):        grid spacing
00045 *    index_[xy]  (in):  [xy] coordinates of local (narrow band) points
00046 *    n*_index    (in):  index range of points to loop over in index_*
00047 *    narrow_band(in):   array that marks voxels outside desired fillbox
00048 *    mark_fb(in):      upper limit narrow band value for voxels in 
00049 *                      fillbox
00050 */
00051 void LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER1_LOCAL(
00052   const LSMLIB_REAL *phi,
00053   const LSMLIB_REAL *delta,
00054   const int *ilo_gb,
00055   const int *ihi_gb,
00056   const int *jlo_gb,
00057   const int *jhi_gb, 
00058   const LSMLIB_REAL *norm_phi_x,
00059   const LSMLIB_REAL *norm_phi_y,
00060   const int *ilo_grad_phi_gb,
00061   const int *ihi_grad_phi_gb,
00062   const int *jlo_grad_phi_gb,
00063   const int *jhi_grad_phi_gb,
00064   const LSMLIB_REAL    *dx,
00065   const LSMLIB_REAL    *dy,
00066   const int *index_x,
00067   const int *index_y,
00068   const int *nlo_index,
00069   const int *nhi_index,
00070   const unsigned char *narrow_band,
00071   const int *ilo_nb_gb,
00072   const int *ihi_nb_gb,
00073   const int *jlo_nb_gb,
00074   const int *jhi_nb_gb,
00075   const unsigned char *mark_fb);   
00076 
00077   
00078 /*
00079 *  LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER2_LOCAL() computes second order accurate delta
00080 *  function discretization of a zero level set for a given ls function
00081 *  following P. Smereka, "The numerical approximation of a delta function 
00082 *  with application to level set methods", JCP, 2006.
00083 *  The function is supported at a minimal set of gridpoints near the zero
00084 *  level set.
00085 *
00086 *  Arguments:
00087 *    phi(in):           level set function
00088 *    delta(out):        discretized delta function corresp. to zero level
00089 *    norm_phi_* (in):   components of grad(phi)/|grad(phi)|, 
00090 *                       obtained by 2nd order central diff
00091 *    *_gb (in):        index range for ghostbox
00092 *    dx,dy(in):        grid spacing
00093 *    index_[xy]  (in):  [xy] coordinates of local (narrow band) points
00094 *    n*_index    (in):  index range of points to loop over in index_*
00095 *    narrow_band(in):   array that marks voxels outside desired fillbox
00096 *    mark_fb(in):      upper limit narrow band value for voxels in 
00097 *                      fillbox
00098 */
00099 void LSM2D_DELTA_FUNCTION_ORDER2_LOCAL(
00100   const LSMLIB_REAL *phi,
00101   const LSMLIB_REAL *delta,
00102   const int *ilo_gb,
00103   const int *ihi_gb,
00104   const int *jlo_gb,
00105   const int *jhi_gb, 
00106   const LSMLIB_REAL *norm_phi_x,
00107   const LSMLIB_REAL *norm_phi_y,
00108   const int *ilo_grad_phi_gb,
00109   const int *ihi_grad_phi_gb,
00110   const int *jlo_grad_phi_gb,
00111   const int *jhi_grad_phi_gb,
00112   const LSMLIB_REAL    *dx,
00113   const LSMLIB_REAL    *dy,
00114   const int *index_x,
00115   const int *index_y,
00116   const int *nlo_index,
00117   const int *nhi_index,
00118   const unsigned char *narrow_band,
00119   const int *ilo_nb_gb,
00120   const int *ihi_nb_gb,
00121   const int *jlo_nb_gb,
00122   const int *jhi_nb_gb,
00123   const unsigned char *mark_fb);
